actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes two attacks: one with claws and one with club.

actions.name: Luring Song
actions.description: Humanoids and giants within 300 ft. that can hear make DC 11 WIS save or be charmed while song continues (bonus action to maintain). Charmed target incapacitated, moves toward harpy; repeats save when damaged by others, before entering harmful terrain, and at end of turns. Success grants 24-hour immunity.
